file.title: AMM PART II-1285 - CHAPTER 71-72-02-02 - ENGINE COMPARTMENT INLET VENT DRAIN - MAINTENANCE PRACTICES

page.data: AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL ENGINE COMPARTMENT INLET VENT DRAIN - MAINTENANCE PRACTICES EFFECTIVITY: ALL 1. General A. This section gives the procedure to clean and do the inspection of the inlet vent drain system of the engine compartment. B. The procedures in this section are given in the sequence below. The tasks identified with ( ♦) are part of the Scheduled Maintenance Requirements Document (SMRD). TASK NUMBER DESCRIPTION EFFECTIVITY INLET VENT DRAIN SYSTEM OF THE EN- ALL 71-72-02-970-801-A GINE COMPARTMENT - CLEANING/ INSPECTION EMB-145 - AMM 1285 General 71-72-02 Page 1 of 4 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL TASK 71-72-02-970-801-A EFFECTIVITY: ALL 2. INLET VENT DRAIN SYSTEM OF THE ENGINE COMPARTMENT - CLEANING/INSPECTION A. General (1) This task is applicable to the LH and RH engines. B. References REFERENCE DESIGNATION AMM MPP 71-00-00/200 - MAINTENANCE PRACTICES C. Zones and Accesses ZONE PANEL/DOOR LOCATION 412 Upper cowling LH engine 422 Upper cowling RH engine D. Tools and Equipment Not Applicable E. Auxiliary Items ITEM DESCRIPTION PURPOSE QTY Commercially ladder To get access to the engine upper cowling 1 available F. Consumable Materials Not Applicable G. Expandable Parts Not Applicable H. Persons Recommended QTY FUNCTION PLACE 1 Does the task Upper cowling I. Preparation SUBTASK 841-002-A WARNING: BEFORE YOU DO THE TASK, OBEY THE SAFETY PRECAUTIONS GIVEN IN AMM MPP 71-00-00/200 TO PREVENT INJURY TO PERSONS AND DAMAGE TO MATERIAL. (1) On the circuit breaker panel, open the circuit breakers below and attach a DO-NOT- CLOSE tag to them. • START 1/2. EMB-145 - AMM 1285 970-801-A/200 71-72-02 Page 2 of 4 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL (2) Put the ladder in the work area. J. Inlet Vent Drain System of the Engine Compartment - Cleaning/Inspection (Figure 201) SUBTASK 970-002-A (1) Put a source of dry clean compressed air on the inlet vent (1) of the upper cowling to clean the drain line (2) and remove possible blockage. (2) To make sure that air goes through the line, put your hand in front of the drain outlet (3). K. Follow-on SUBTASK 842-002-A (1) Remove the ladder from the work area. (2) On the circuit breaker panel, close the circuit breakers below and remove the DO- NOT-CLOSE tag from them. • START 1/2. EMB-145 - AMM 1285 970-801-A/200 71-72-02 Page 3 of 4 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.
